column4: the videos are working fine without desktop effects, but why am i not able to watch the videos with the desktop effects?
it can be a video memory thing, I found it this sometimes happens when I have many windows open, somtetimes just logging in and out solves it
you see in desktop effects mode, each window is placed in the GFX card's memory, and a full-screen window needs a lot of it
ok, but is it possible to run the videos with the desktop effects?
